Lyric:
[00:06.570]As sly as a fox, as strong as an ox
[00:09.740]As fast as a hare, as brave as a bear
[00:13.090]As free as a bird, as neat as a word
[00:16.360]As quite as a mouse, as big as a house
[00:19.950]All I wanna be,
[00:25.990]All I wanna be,
[00:32.000]Ohhh all I wanna be
[00:39.320]Is everything
[00:42.870]As mean as a wolf, as sharp as a tooth
[00:46.130]As deep as a bite, as dark as the night
[00:49.520]As sweet as a song, as right as a wrong
[00:52.830]As long as a road, as ugly as a toad
[00:56.160]As pretty as a picture hanging from a fixture
[00:59.680]Strong like a family, strong as I wanna be
[01:02.960]Bright as day, as light as play
[01:06.050]As hard as nails, as grand as a whale
[01:09.610]All I wanna be,
[01:15.170]Ohhh all I wanna be
[01:21.600]Ohhh all I wanna be
[01:28.940]Is everything
[01:31.110]Everything at once
[01:34.500]Everything at once
[01:38.140]Ohh oh everything I want
[01:45.900]As warm as the sun, as silly as fun
[01:49.050]As cool as a tree, as scary as the sea
[01:52.470]As hot as fire, cold as ice
[01:55.800]Sweet as sugar and everything nice
[01:59.120]As old as time, as straight as a line
[02:02.360]As royal as a queen, as buzzed as a bee
[02:05.650]Stealth as a tiger, smooth as a glide
[02:09.170]Pure as a melody, pure as I wanna be
[02:12.650]All I wanna be,
[02:18.000]Ohhh all I wanna be
[02:24.480]Ohhh all I wanna be
